member.name: T:ArdanStudios.Common.SmppClient.ConnectionModes
member.summary: ESME (Extended Short Message Entity) may bind to the SMSC (Short Message Service Centre) as either a Transmitter (called ESME Transmitter), a Receiver (called ESME Receiver) or a Transceiver (called ESME Transceiver)

member.name: F:ArdanStudios.Common.SmppClient.ConnectionModes.Transmitter
member.summary: An ESME bound as a Transmitter is authorised to send short messages to the SMSC and to receive the corresponding SMPP responses from the SMSC

member.name: F:ArdanStudios.Common.SmppClient.ConnectionModes.Receiver
member.summary: An ESME bound as a Receiver is authorised to receive short messages from the SMSC and to return the corresponding SMPP message responses to the SMSC

member.name: F:ArdanStudios.Common.SmppClient.ConnectionModes.Transceiver
member.summary: An ESME bound as a Transceiver is allowed to send messages to the SMSC and receive messages from the SMSC over a single SMPP session
